revised_title: A Comprehensive Study of Lunar Luminescence Techniques and Phenomena
tldr: This article discusses the techniques and phenomena of lunar luminescence, focusing on spectrometric and colorimetric methods. The authors analyze the challenges and inaccuracies in these methods and provide insights into the mechanisms of luminescence on the Moon. They also explore the wavelength variation of emitted light and its potential sources, as well as the importance of minimizing errors in future lunar luminescence observations.
